full_summary:
# Tender Information
### Solicitation Number
* 5000072796-B

### Publication Date
* April 13, 2023

### Tender Closing Date and Time
* May 9, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)

### Expected Contract Start Date
* June 1, 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
* May 31, 2024

### Description
Natural Resources Canada's Chief Information Officer Branch (CIOB) invites bids for a Help Desk Specialist service. The Help Desk Specialist will provide a single point of contact for informatics problems and queries related to office automation tools, products, and services. The service will also provide onsite Operations Support for IT support and mobile phone support.

### Background
The CIOB has embarked on an IT Service Management program to implement Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) best practices within Natural Resources Canada. The ITIL program aims to provide better IT service management and support to the departmental clients.

### Key Deliverables
* Provide a Help Desk Specialist service to respond to informatics problems and queries related to office automation tools, products, and services
* Provide onsite Operations Support for IT support and mobile phone support
* Meet the IT Service Management requirements as outlined in the ITIL program

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The evaluation criteria will include factors such as the bidder's experience, qualifications, and references.

### Procurement Method
This is a competitive tendering process, and the bidders will be shortlisted based on their submissions.

### Trade Agreements
The tender is open to bidders who are eligible to bid under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other eligible trade agreements.

### Regions
The contract will be delivered in Canada.

### Contracting Entity
Natural Resources Canada
